```
oc create secret tls my-tls --cert=fullchain.pem --key=privkey.pem -n my-project
```

```yaml
envsubst  <<EOF | oc apply -f -
apiVersion: cert-manager.io/v1
kind: Certificate
metadata:
  name: customdomain-certificate-tls
  namespace: cert-manager
spec:
  secretName: custom-domain-certificate-tls
  issuerRef:
     name: letsencryptissuer
     kind: ClusterIssuer
  commonName: "x.apps.$DOMAIN"
  dnsNames:
  - "x.apps.$DOMAIN"
  - "y.apps.$DOMAIN"
  - "z.apps.$DOMAIN"
EOF
```
Note that you should replace `x.apps.$DOMAIN` with the actual domain name you want to use for your custom domain.
Also, you should create the `letsencryptissuer` resource separately and reference it in the `issuerRef` section of the `Certificate` resource.
